p: The 36 compounds found in SCST were collected, of which 22 were isolated and identified in our laboratory, and the other 14 were purchased from Co. SaiBaiCao (Beijing, China). The 36 monomers were dissolved separately in DMSO and tested at concentrations of 12.5–400 μM. In all of the dilutions, the concentration of DMSO did not exceed 0.1%.
